website_summaries.verdict: The Sol Republic Master Tracks have a distinct, eye-catching design and good performance, offering better, more refined sound than the original Tracks.
pros: The over-the-ear Sol Republic Master Tracks have a clean, modern design, and offer a relatively comfortable fit with good sound that's punctuated by strong bass response.
Also, the headband can be swapped out
and there's an Apple friendly inline remote/microphone
cons: The headphones don't fold up or fold flat
Also, they don't sound as detailed at lower volumes

website_summaries.verdict: The SOL Republic Master Tracks headphones feature a comfortable design and plenty of low-end, but highs and high-mids could be more present.
pros: Delivers powerful audio with distortion-free deep bass
Inline microphone and remote control for mobile devices
cons: Highly sculpted frequency response with boosted bass, lacks a bit in high-mids and highs
Ear pads tend to get hot

customer_reviews.title: Not for the clumsy
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great, they have awesome sound and sound cancellation and they are very nicely built. The only problem for me with these are that I have already gone through one pair of these and it was quite a short life aswell, one day one of the "sound engines" just stopped working. This time around a similar thing happened except that the port in the engine has become faulty. The only reason I can think of for this to happen is when I accidentally yank the wire or get it caught on something. So my advice is that if you are someone that regularly gets the cable caught on something then these will have a very short life span.
customer_reviews.author: Max A.

customer_reviews.title: So good! I do get some funny looks when I ...
customer_reviews.text: So good! I do get some funny looks when I put them together in public but they block everyone out so it doesn't really matter haha They are comfy but after a while you can feel the weight and need some adjustment but overall not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy this awesome machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome!!! Recommend it to everybody looking for Head-phones. Bass, Treble, comfort wearing. Everything just perfect! Only inconvenient is that it is made only for Apple products. That means that some functions may not work. For example, the controller does not entirely work. Comment from an ex-Beats Dr Dre user.
customer_reviews.author: Aina Rabarijohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. More robust than some of the more expensive options
customer_reviews.author: Mini Mum

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound but there is a loud creaking every time moisture (and sometimes without) gets in
customer_reviews.author: john dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: great headphones, really last well, ive had a long time and they still look brand new
customer_reviews.author: PersonA

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love love love them
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love love love them, brilliant sound quality, noise cancellation is on point and they're cheaper than Beats so what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: kira-lily Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Decent when they work, but they can break easily if you take the cabling out often
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these headphones are good, and I would like to say I'm very happy with them, however, I'm now on my third pair of headphones. I had to keep replacing the units under warranty because the sound would randomly go on one side, which I suspect is to do with poor material choice for the cable/sockets. Granted I was removing the cables and taking the headset apart twice a day for carrying around, but as the headset is built/designed to do that, you wouldn't expect them to fail if you choose to use a feature built into them. 3/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Linton

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, poor build quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of headphones with good sound quality. However the cable has broken twice now and SOL Republic has refused to replace them despite them being covered by a warranty, they do sell replacement cables online for a ridiculous price so this is a little suspicious. While these are a good pair of headphones I would advice against getting them due to their apparent propensity to break and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I find the sound quality to be excellent and they are very comfortable one can have them on all day.I would certainly recommend them to other people.
customer_reviews.author: T Birch

customer_reviews.title: I have worn them for several hours on long-haul flights and they have been very comfortable. The one thing I would mention
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade from the SOL republic tracks with the V10 engine. There is a noticeable improvement in sound quality and noise insulation. I have worn them for several hours on long-haul flights and they have been very comfortable. The one thing I would mention, and is only a tiny thing, around your ears can get warm and sweaty with prolonged use due to the material that the foam ear surrounds are covered in. Other than this and compared to other high end head-phones with their astronomical prices the SOL republic master tracks are great
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Major design fault
customer_reviews.text: Died within a year. Due to a significant design fault. Every pair I've had has died due to breakdown of the connection of the wire to the headphone, and always the left side!
customer_reviews.author: SABRE

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but a little uncomfortable when worn for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but a little uncomfortable when worn for more than an hour but al in all good head phone's, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset. Love them. Amazingly comfortable and will not break Also try getting the fiio amp aswell. Great asset.
customer_reviews.author: Javel McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Cable does not match the quality of the sound!
customer_reviews.text: It's cable is not of the best quality. I totally ignored a previous review made to this product ... my mistake!
customer_reviews.author: ISTQB Student

customer_reviews.title: We did not think this item was genuine. My ...
customer_reviews.text: We did not think this item was genuine. My grandson bought his previous set in Australia ( he still has then but broken). 3 people looked at them and did not think they were the real deal plus the stand was broken. the wires were a different colour etc just small issues. We were told we would be refunded our return cost (about £5) which was not the case but we were grateful to get them returned and have a refund.
customer_reviews.author: eileen powell

customer_reviews.title: First Class Headphones
customer_reviews.text: All good cant fault them. Excellent sound quality, light and comfortable to wear. Fold up nice and neat for carriage.
customer_reviews.author: hollylodge

customer_reviews.title: I got these to add to what feels like a growing collection
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple pairs of Sol Republic headphones. I got these to add to what feels like a growing collection. I liked the fit and brought them to use at my work. I work in an office space environment. The headphones began to short out and I initially expected it to be the Aux cord, since I've had to replace those in the past. I got a new cord, but the issue was still there. I understand that I ordered a refurbished set, but they did not even last a full year with minimal use. I still love the brand and will continue to by Sol Republic products, but I will avoid buying any used ones going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones/Better Customer Service at Sol Republic
customer_reviews.text: Revised Review - 12/22/2017: I am a moron. There are plugs at the bottom of each earpiece. One side wasn't connected properly and that's why there was no sound. 3 minutes on a call with customer service got them up and running with no problem. Great sounding as they were before the one side was detached. Got these headphones during the first week of August 2017. Stopped working properly in mid-December 2017. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tapper65

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! After around a year, the left driver stopped working. I can see that the internal wires that connect the audio jack to the driver have frayed and disconnected. There does not appear to be an easy way to repair it. Reading on Sol's website, this is a defect that many people have experienced. This is clearly due to poor engineering. I am very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Really great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great headphones for the price. comfortable on the head, they do get uncomfortable after about 6 hours of continuous use, just because the pockets are big enough to fit bigger ears. But sound wise they have beautiful high and mid-range but for the base, on the other hand, its good enough that you can still feel it and it is satisfying, but it is nothing compared to other higher brands like marshalls line of headphones or beats. If they had just a little bit of a better base I would give them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Belch

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are bass heavy (which i prefer), and honestly sound better than beats solo2's which I also own. I find these cans very durable and comfortable. I have a very large head and they fit just fine. These cans sound incredible listening to hiphop, electronic, techno, dubstep, etc.. I would not recommend these for acoustic, vocal, classical type music as the mids and highs aren't as accurate. These cans are made for hiphop/electronic bass heavy music. I use these for the gym and playing video games they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tempting, but don’t.
customer_reviews.text: They do have good sound, but only as long as they produce Sound. One speaker stopped working a while back and we are about 3 or 4 months outside of our one year warranty. I’m not real happy spending this much money on a lemon. I’ve gone to Sol Republic’s website to try to find a replacement speaker, but haven’t had any luck. Most of the info I’ve found online suggests I have to open it up and perform surgery. I’m not an electrician so that doesn’t sound like the best option. I’ll try to talk to someone with the company, but based on all the similar problems I’ve read about suggest I won’t have any better luck than them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Moyes

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I like these but there are some things you should know before committing. To begin with, they are pretty heavy on the bass (I personally like this). Also, the ear-holes are pretty small so they are essentially fancy "on ear" headphones unless your ears are quite small. Some might find the uncomfortable for long periods especially if their head is large. And like all the other Tracks, the cable is not as heavy duty as one would hope. They look awesome and feel solid. I like the case that is included. I have not figured out how to use the cable remote with Android.
customer_reviews.author: Peter F.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the best headphones I've ever purchased the sound quality is amazing all the tones areal very equally blended the bass can be very powerful if you adjust the sound on an equalizer but when just listing to music on say your phone the the bass is heard but not overpowering they are very light weight and the real leather is a nice touch and the interchangeability between parts gives you toe ability to replace parts if broken say if an animal chewed threw the cables all that would be needed to fix them would be a few seconds on amazon and waiting on shiping
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Bumpin’
customer_reviews.text: Although these are my 5th pair of Sol Republics, I buy them because they bump heavy and keep the sound out when I’m DJing at the club. I have to buy them every 2 years due to some problems with one side always going out on me, but I don’t fault the company for that. I put them through rough abuse in my DJ bag and frequent gigging. I’ll keep buying as long as they make these. They’re much easier to handle on and off the ear than Sony’s, because they don’t flip around on a swivel. I like that much better.
customer_reviews.author: John Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound. For low Ohm headphones the sound is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound. For low Ohm headphones the sound is very clean. The sound profile is definitely leaning towards the bass which remain clean and clear while not drowning out the mids. Minus 2 stars because the description of "over the ear" is not accurate. Although the pads are big, they rest on your ears and not on your skull. the padding is soft but the internal diameter is too small and there is no space for teh ear in it. unless your ears are abnormally small. A more accurate description would be "Large on ear headphones". I am unable to wear them for more than a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: DJmaya

customer_reviews.title: Rock crusher headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid set of headphones Nicely painted metal housings. I found that sound improved over time. My biggest problem and it's a big one.. It,s the Head band, made of really tough plastic that is unforgivable, a real rock crusher. It makes listening over period of time very painful No way to adjust clamping pressure. Wish they made a larger head band. I have tried expanding it over a book to no avail. won't loosen at all. Too bad really.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Packer , Boston Ma.

customer_reviews.title: Those finally stopped working but I was so happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I was a big fan of this brand. I had a pair of their headphones for years. Those finally stopped working but I was so happy with them, so I bought these headphones. Things were good, but within 3 weeks the right hear stopped working... I called their support, waited on hold for over and hour. They had an option that they would call me back when the next representative was available, so I did that. I never heard from them. I am done with the brand, not only because their product didn't work, but also because of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M Price

customer_reviews.title: Left speaker out in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for less than a year, and the left speaker already went out. This is so dissapointing as I push the Sol Republic brand on anyone asking for a recommendation. These are my newest and second pair of Sol headphones, different models, and they've already gave out. I hate to leave a bad review because I love this brand and their products, but this particular model is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Muñiz

customer_reviews.title: Soo comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these a few days and I am totally glad I bought them. The sound is AMAZING and they are so soft and comfortable to wear. I use them on the treadmill and I don't get any distortion from the cable unlike what I was getting from ear buds. I wear gaming headsets a lot and I must say if these came with a microphone I'd totally buy another pair. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: MY whole family is disappointed with Sol Republic products. We have had to replace several ear phones because they just quit working. Recently, I tried to contact Sol Republic be email and voice mail and got no reply. I had to go to Amazon, who was generous enough to do a return for me after the return period. We didn't even have these head phones for 3 months and they quit working. We're trying a different brand next time!!
customer_reviews.author: ATNT1996

customer_reviews.title: Bass for your ears!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know where to begin. I bought these for one reason. BASS!!!! I reviewed different headphones for hours till I landed on these Sol republic ones. Wanted headphones with bass. I had some beats studio before. Let me tell you, the mids and highs sound waaaaaaay better then on the beats. The bass sounds amazing.. the louder you put the music on, the deeper the bass gets. I love these.. I prefer these than the beats.. So if you're looking for headphones like the beats but cost less, look no further.. Three material they are made from also feel great.. Quality stuff.. Unlike beats, cheap plastic.. I hope this review helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jovel

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is pretty good but lacking in comfort
customer_reviews.text: Over all I really like these headphones they have great sound and build quality but as far as comfort goes that is a little disappointing. The first about 20-30 minuets of wearing these headphones is really great they feel amazing and sound great but after that your ears will start to hurt and if not set right your head as well. overall they are good but you need to get them just right on your head for them to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua H.

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great sound
customer_reviews.text: By far the best set of headphones I have ever used. The sound is tremendous. The soft foam ear covers block outside noise so all I get is the music. These replace a pair of Sony headphones that broke at the earpiece swivel. And there is no fixing those. The reason I opted for the Master Tracks is that every component is replaceable and can be purchased separately. I recommend these to audiophiles everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The build quality on this headset is superb, comfort is really good and in the winter they will keep your ears warm. Sound is excellent if you like a full rich sound with a good bass kick with most new music styles.Some music primarily old school may sound a little Muddy ( not a lot of separation of highs lows and midrange and vocals) I think these blow away most Beats with their build quality and sound with the exception of the new Beats Studio headphones but they are $299,For the money SOL Master tracks is a great value and a great choice for quality music aficionados
customer_reviews.author: Moderne

customer_reviews.title: these headphones sound great, a perfect mix of Treble
customer_reviews.text: I recently baught a new pair after my other pair broke. I had my previous pair since I was a sophmore in high school, and Im a junior in college now. these headphones sound great, a perfect mix of Treble, Bass, and mid. I use them for gaming, studio work, and just casually. They are really comfortable, and are good for extensive use. The headphones are phenominal and the price is affordable. Definetly worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Left speaker sound goes in and out.
customer_reviews.text: Loves these at first but the left speaker goes in and out. I constantly have to jiggle the cable to get sound from it. And yes, I tested the cable by switching the left and right speakers and it's always the same speaker, regardless of cable. Sadly, it looks like I'm not even close to the only person with this complaint. I recommended these headphones to two people (and these friends both then bought them) before I learned that the quality was shit so I feel bad about that. Customer support never responded. Interestingly enough, when my girlfriend told Sol customer support, they sent her new ones.
customer_reviews.author: hansmosh

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from the V10 engines to EX, it had to take some time to notice extreme differences. Unlike the Sol Republic V10s, the bass does not overshadow the treble, the high and lows are simply crisp. These are the headphones that surprise you when listening to your favorite song because you'll hear instruments that you never heard before. Cons: after 30-45mins the outer part of one's ear will begin to hurt. These headphones are big so it's not as fashionable and easy to just wear around the streets. Overall Sol Republic made an amazing piece of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Headphones were amazing..
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were amazing.....for about 6 months. Then the 3 button Mic+volume controls stopped and the headphones malfunctioned. Other than that, it changed music for me. I was missing 90% of the songs I was listening to. They had instruments in there I never heard before due to bad headphones. Submitted warranty claim, advised of tax/duty charges and told if I accept, they will send replacement. I must say I am happy customer so far! Hopefully the replacements last longer, but damn, these are good quality sound!
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: I bought them for a friend!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot deny that prime benefits save tons of money over the big box stores. A friend of mine paid me for these and he had no complaints! They sound good, work good , fit nice. The only problem with them he said is he has a problem when he works out that they aren't ear buds.. but what are you going to do about that lol. Good buy, I would buy for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kubilus

customer_reviews.title: Fun to open, fun to wear. Great sound, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most dynamic packaging of a product, I've ever received. Great as a gift, just a really fun thing to unbox. That being said, it's also a great product. I brought my GF a pair of Beats as a Christmas gift, and got these for myself a few months later. Sounds just the same, and these are actually a bit more comfortable. And for a less than a third of the price too. Also much cheaper here than on the retailers website.
customer_reviews.author: Denisha

customer_reviews.title: great look and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I heard about Sol Republic early this year, how great the sound was plus the interchangeable parts, I read about the price versus the Beats and I am glad I purchased this ones, here on Amazon are cheaper than the Sol Republic website. Item arrived on time well pack, after I bought two, I was so please that I ordered two more and I about to order another one. If u are a DJ or Sound Engineer you probably will need something more expensive but to listen your favorite songs and look cool Sol Republic are Two Thumbs Up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Franco

customer_reviews.title: Good Value; Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplistic design of these headphones. The sound is good. Probably suited more for hip hop music w/ more bass. The highs and lows aren't as sharp for acoustic / rock genres. The noise cancelling feature is awesome. You can't hear anything except the music. I think these are a great deal for $80. One problem I had was that they hurt my ears when wearing for an extended period (an hour or more). I have a big head though.
customer_reviews.author: burrito78

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for about 2 days then I took them apart, placed them in their case and put it in my bag for transport. I arrived at my destination, put them together and now the left one doesn't work or rather it only works at a specific angle. The headphones looks beautiful and I was ready to provide a great review on this but after what happened I will advise that you take care when transporting these if you do buy then. The metal thing might be durable and "indestructible" but the Headphones are very fragile. Sound quality was great but because of my little problem I do not even use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: stain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Sol Republic's master tracks definitely have a powerful sound and hip hip tailored base. I thoroughly enjoyed owning these. I have though, owned two pairs of these in the past, and with each one after about 3-4 months, the right headphone would either become more quiet than the other or would not put out any sound altogether. A fantastic pair of headphones they would be if not for their unreliability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. I've had problems with how comfortable other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I've had problems with how comfortable other headphones are because I wear glasses most of the time. These are the most confortable headphones I have ever had. They feel great and have a good weight but not too much. Only downsides are that they are very big and stick out a bit from my head so I don't really wear them in public. Also the headphones have the main chord split into two instead of the popular single chord. This can be annoying but nothing more than that. Great headphones expecially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Great if your upgrading from a the Tracks HD and want a more stereo wide image on your iPhone. Terrible if your moving from Sony MDR's to these for mixing, they're way too muddy. Keep in mind that Sol Republic is currently not selling the 3-Button replacement cable, which is pretty much the whole point of buying Sol Republic products: interchangeable and replaceable parts.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and great for flights! Totally worth it and have converted my family over to SOL.
customer_reviews.text: I love these they are so comfortable and I can even wear my earrings and it not feel like they are being jammed into my head. The bass in these are great and I wear these on flights where I just want to drown out my surroundings. I love how I take them apart and put them in my carrying bag. I've not purchased any accessories but would like too. Definitely would buy more in the future. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. Gilbeau

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Sumptuous sound - great highs and mids, deep bass, and GREAT value!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hajek

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, I have been using them for three ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, I have been using them for three months now and they sound great. The only reason why I dont give it a full five stars is because the pads can really pressure your jaw, but maybe that is just because I have a big head so it may change from person to person. Quality-wise this is great set and cheap for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've had by far
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've had by far. The 1/4" adapter included was great, allows me to use pocket amplifiers for my guitar. The quality is great, good bass, good high tones, and good voice. I've had A LOT of headphones and earphones and these are the best I've ever used. Beats are trash compared to these.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect care was taken of them and there was no ...
customer_reviews.text: The left headphone went out in about a week and the right went out about 2 weeks after that. Perfect care was taken of them and there was no water damage. just cheap plastic and poor quality sound that was only useful for a week. Pathetic for "pro quality" gear.
customer_reviews.author: Zach seaberg

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the sound would be mind-blowing but it's just good. I'm going to give them a try with a better quality player, like an iPod to see if there's any difference. Quite comfy but after like half an hour my ears are wet and kinda sore. Deep bass but the mids-high are not crispy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are just simply amazing. I recommend listening to bass boosted songs because of how smooth the bass is.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are just simply amazing. I recommend listening to bass boosted songs because it just sounds so good. The bass is already good. With the bass boost it sounds really good. The bass isn't muddy. I had the sol republic tracks before these ones and I'am quiet impressed on how much of a difference there is in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Darr

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these now and both of them broke. Both times the left ear has stopped working. For something so expensive I would want to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Misanplaus

customer_reviews.title: Broke After a Month of Careful Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Master Tracks for a little over a month and the sound in my left soundbox has been going in and out for the last couple of days. The soundbox seems to work better when it's not on the headband, but clearly that's not going to work for me. At first I thought that it was the cord but when I checked it with my sol republic tracks it worked fine. I actually like the sound and the style, but I'm extremely disappointed in the manufacturing at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Bektu Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for about a year. One side of ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a year. One side of the headphones stopped working however. So they are basically worthless now. Unless you want to listen to music in one ear.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, beautiful, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the modular design, it can be split into independent pieces, if something breaks you can replace only the broken part, not like my previous headphones that broke a part of the foldable headband and became instantly useless. Sound is great, noise isolation is amazing and they feel very comfortable. Only problem is that, because it covers all ear, you ears might heat a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: tothemario

customer_reviews.title: One of the ear pieces quit working after two months ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the ear pieces quit working after two months. Happened to another pair that I bought my son at the same time. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Less Than 3 months old and don't work
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these at the end of October and issued them out for listening to audio on the computer...within these 3 months, all 3 pair had one earpiece that no longer worked...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stenger

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I got these around the first week of January and buy the end of the month i had to buy a new auxiliary cord and now my left has shortened out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephon Utsey

customer_reviews.title: not enough bass
customer_reviews.text: nice headphones, but returned them because not enough base - but all around good sound - Nice quality and build, just did not have the thump - got the Monster Npulse - was a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: CMJONES

customer_reviews.title: Sol rocks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, replacing a beat up overpriced Beat headphones... so it's all good. Possible customization, cool design and good sound!
customer_reviews.author: Pascal Renault

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the BEST Headphones I've ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: I think that for the price of these headphones, you are getting a great deal. The quality of construction and materials are excellent, very comfortable. The sound quality is great, clear highs, well balanced mids and great deep bass.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones period
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones period. Excellent low end sound. Bass is amazing. I listen to rap/hip hop/ jazz/ r&b. Probably not your first choice if your listen to a lot of high pitch vocals
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought them after researching for a while, it has the perfect balance of audio. I listen to all type of music, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Zeek

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever owned. Great base good midrange and super voices. Very comfortable to wear and fit very well. Really enjoy these for all purposes. Super job Sol Republic!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I've never spent more than $40 for headphones/earbuds. Always used to be one of those "good enough" listeners. These headphones changed everything. Build quality is amazing, literally wear these for hours and don't feel uncomfortable. I'm no audiophile, but these make all kinds of music sound very clear, the bass can be a little overpowering if you turn the volume way up, but at those levels, it doesn't matter what you're listening to before you're at risk for hearing loss.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: sound is awsome and from what people say on the other end of a phone conversation the mike is excelent sound quality as well but
customer_reviews.text: So light , so comfertable , sound is awsome and from what people say on the other end of a phone conversation the mike is excelent sound quality as well but for the price I think they should give a few diferant color head bands with the purchace. But even still I LOVE them !!!
customer_reviews.author: charley smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with product. My first head phone. It was light and easy on the ears. The sound was very clear, no echo or distortion at all. Great product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i did it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for most any music. If you dont like the original tuning just download an equalizer. Loses a bit of bass on house and electro but nothing too serious. Great headphones, comfort level 9/10 and I wear glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: The overall sound quality is phenomenal! But the bass was lacking that punch I was looking for. I still love the thing but I was disappointed in the outcome of the bass. Great mids and highs with clear tone and fantastic noise cancellation. Also very comfortable. They are on the larger side of the headphone community but I like the look of it. They also seem very durable ( I've had them for 2 months with no problems). Overall I would recommend these to someone!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Frye

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Left ear cup always fails within one month. This has happened to two pairs of master tracks. Sol Republic does not do returns, as they do not see it fit. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gage d.

customer_reviews.title: sounds awesome, use for the gym lifting
customer_reviews.text: sounds awesome, use for the gym lifting, have notice after a while that my cords go out on the left ear. common problem i'm reading but if it's just for the house or traveling i assume that problem won't occur
customer_reviews.author: Tim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not good bass but good sound overall
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, the adjustable band is interesting.. never seen it before. For 120 bucks i think its a good deal. Would i buy it again? Probably not, only because i like better bass on my headphones. But im still glad with my purchase and it delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Kalene

customer_reviews.title: ... had the return these headphones 2 times and would like to return them again
customer_reviews.text: I have had the return these headphones 2 times and would like to return them again. They have all either stopped working and th piece that plugs into anything has broken twice. We are extremely careful with these and are highly disappointed. We own 2 other pairs that are an older model and they have worked great. Very unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Jayson T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert, but we did test various other brands in the store, including Beats audio headphones. I thought these had much clearer, excellent sound, with a strong but not overpowering bass. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: QualityBrands

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones amazeing bass and its really nice when you have to pack it up cause the headphones slide off the band and they stay on the band really well when you have them on highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great until a speaker failed.
customer_reviews.text: They were terrific for the first 6 months. A bit bulky, but super comfortable. Wouldn't wear them for working out, but to just listen to music, they're great. Nice, spacious sound quality. So why 2 stars? Well, after those 6 months of light use, one of the speakers died, so now they're useless and I'm out $100.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Headphones sounded great, but dont fit "larger" ears
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sounded great, but dont fit "larger" ears. Not an uncommon problem, but for the price, I had to return them and got the Bose QC15 instead (they fit my ears).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best sound👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, he loves these, the best sound👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: rhonda j. lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones, but not for audiophiles
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, a little heavy on the bass but its tight and "well behaved" a great alternative to overpriced beats by dre, they sound better too. Also the ultra plush ear chushons are comfortable for long periods of listening.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Cans
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for the price, in my opinion fair superior then any pair of beats . -great sound -great style -great price!
customer_reviews.author: parm

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working. Don't waste your money. UPDATE***** Second Pair stopped working also!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: If you want comfortable headphones that sound great
customer_reviews.text: If you want comfortable headphones that sound great, you need this item. Also, I bought them in white and it's a really gorgeous white.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!!! The sound and fit are perfect . I also got the skull candy aviators Love them as well.. BY far the best I have used !! and I have defiantely gone through my share of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Mick97

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound but this band was too small for my big head (I wear a 7-3/4 fitted cap). Hope that Sol makes a larger band in the future so that I can try them again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones, terrible build.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones, however I received these in January of 2017, and the left ear cup stopped working in June of 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of headphones that I own
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with these headphones the moment that I tried them on. Everything sounds very crisp and clear when listening through them. They are easily the best headphones you can get in the $150-200 price range. Not to mention, the stylish look is an absolute bonus. These will certainly attract attention no matter where you go.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Not my type of headphones
customer_reviews.text: The quality is definitely good, but the earphones get uncomfortable very quickly and the headband kinda squeezes me head on the sides, really making my head hurt after a while. The phones are half over-ear, half on-ear which isn't the greatest, especially if you have above average sized ears. The cord is also very short, so if you want to use these headphones for anything other than mobile devices usage, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Teague

customer_reviews.title: Received with GREAT Enthusiasm
customer_reviews.text: I gavet these headphones as a gift. He was ecstatic - so I can only assume the product is a good one!
customer_reviews.author: 4DSC

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, as good as if not better than my previous Beats @$299, especially the bass range. I have two Sol republic on-ear headphones.This over-ear version is more comfortable and has a superior quality. Also reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for good headphones for a while and I found these, after testing the Beats and others brands I found out this is the same (or better) quality, for a lower and reasonable price, you pay for the product without having to pay for the mainstream advertising. If you want excellent sound quality, buy these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Vera

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, however I don't have a large head ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, however I don't have a large head and I always get a slight headache from where they land on my head
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: ... is our second set our family has purchased very pleased with the clarity of these ear phones
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set our family has purchased very pleased with the clarity of these ear phones.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hooberry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy SOL Republic earphones
customer_reviews.text: Earphones started cracking and shutting off on left side after 3 months. SOL Republic will not honor warranty as Amazon & EMusic Enterprise are not authorized re-sellers of the product. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Plugging in the first time rough, but amazing quality and great sound cancelation
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, amazingly comfortable fit. I got really really worried when I plugged it all in and didn't work but the separate plugs to the headphones themselves have to be put in with a decent force or it's not fully connected; problem was fixed when I pushed them in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.text: It's just amazing product.Im using headphone for a while (7 months) and its still solid. For me bass and treble quality perfect you get really thick bass and,really good high end anysong i ever listened.
customer_reviews.author: Melih B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: We hunted quite a bit and decided this was the best value for sound quality, comfort and quality of build. Very happy with these they are still on my wish list as I want a pair, my son won't share:)
customer_reviews.author: nancy thayer

product_meta.title: SOL REPUBLIC Master Tracks X3 Over-Ear Headphones – Noise Isolation, Club Like Sound, Mic + Music & Siri Control, 14" Adapter, Virtually Indestructible, 1601-30 Gunmetal
product_meta.description: Color:GunmetalSol Republic's 1601-32 Master Tracks Over-Ear Headphones, in white, are the first interchangeable over-ear headphones to deliver incredible sound, design, and performance. Whether you listen to EDM, country or hip-hop, Master Tracks are engineered to deliver true sound you can feel. Our newly developed X3 Sound Engines deliver an immersive music experience balanced with powerful bass, clear highs and vocal accuracy. The lightweight construction is designed for enjoying music in comfort for hours. Adjustable SonicSoft Speaker cushions provide the perfect fit for optimized noise isolation. Constructed of an advanced polymer compound, the FlexTech Sound Track headband is built to withstand heavy abuse. Twist it, bend it, drop it - it's not going to break on you. Control your calls and your music with the touch of a button. The three-button remote lets you adjust the volume, pause/resume/skip music tracks and answer/hang-up calls. Plus, the high clarity mic captures every word.
feature_bullets: X3 sound engine speakers deliver powerful bass, clear highs and supreme vocal accuracy. Connectivity Technology: Wired
Virtually indestructible FlexTech Sound Track headband has a 1,000 day guarantee
Compatible with REMIX collection of headbands
Compatible with most Apple, Android and Windows devices that uses a 3.5mm jack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars425 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
